mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (open_id, goods_id, goods_number) VALUES (#{openId},#{goodsId},#{number})
mapper.update: update shopping_cart set goods_number=#{number} where goods_id=#{goodsId} and open_id=#{openId}
mapper.select: select * from `order` order by id desc limit 1

select g.id as id, g.image_address as imageUrl, g.name as name, (gn.number-gn.sale_number) as number, gn.unit as numberUnit, gp.number as price, g.category as category, f.name as origin, sc.goods_number as selectNumber from shopping_cart sc left join goods g on sc.goods_id=g.id left join goods_number gn on sc.goods_id=gn.goods_id left join goods_price gp on gp.goods_id=sc.goods_id left join farmers f on f.id=g.origin_id where sc.open_id=#{openId} and g.if_delete=0;

select g.id as id, g.image_address as imageUrl, g.name as name, g.category as category, f.name as origin, sc.goods_number as selectNumber from shopping_cart sc left join goods g on sc.goods_id=g.id left join farmers f on f.id=g.origin_id where sc.open_id=#{openId} and g.if_delete=0 and sc.goods_id=#{goodsId};
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_cart where goods_id=#{goodsId} and open_id=#{openId}
